title: 'The Gracekeepers' Sets Damplings Against The Landlockers
teaser: The world of The Gracekeepers has two types of people â€” those of the land and those of the sea. NPR's Rachel Martin speaks with Kirsty Logan about her novel, set in a future enveloped by water.
